sourcesContent: import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-img', templateUrl: './img.component.html', styleUrls: ['./img.component.scss'], }) export class ImgComponent { @Input() img: string = ''; imageDefault = './assets/images/default.jpg'; constructor() {} imgError() { this.img = this.imageDefault; } imgLoaded() { console.log('loading'); } }
